EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Arbalester
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Increases your ranged sneak attack and Point Blank Shot range by 5 meters for every trained Mechanic Core enhancement. You also gain proficiency with great crossbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Tanglefoot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Alchemical Trap Activate: Throws a flask of caustic liquid at your enemy, which explodes into a sticky mess. Enemies caught within by the goo puddle take: 4d6 +1 per Sneak Attack Die in Acid damage every 2 seconds (Damage scales with 200% Ranged Power, Reflex DC 10 equal to Disable Device Skill +1d20 for half damage and negate Slow. Anti-requisite: This enhancement cannot be taken at the same time as Tanglefoot in the Half-Elf tree. Cooldown: 30 seconds. Spell Resistance: No

DC.Name: Mechanic: Tanglefoot
DC.Description: Alchemical Trap Activate: Throws a flask of caustic liquid at your enemy, which explodes into a sticky mess. Enemies caught within by the goo puddle take: 4d6 +1 per Sneak Attack Die in Acid damage every 2 seconds (Damage scales with 200% Ranged Power)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Targeting Sights
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can now use your Intelligence modifier for damage modifier with all crossbows and thrown weapons. You also gain proficiency with light repeating crossbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Improved Detection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can detect traps and search from 50% further away. You also gain proficiency with heavy repeating crossbows. +1 to-hit and damage, and 1 extra Sneak Attack die with bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sniper
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1d6 Sneak Attack die with bows, repeating crossbows, and thrown weapons. Non-repeating crossbows instead gain +3d6 extra sneak attack damage dice and +2[W]. Great Crossbows now vorpal on a 19-20

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Hip Flask
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Hip Flask: Passive: +2 Dexterity and Intelligence, +1 to hit with all crossbows, +1 damage with all repeating crossbows, +2 damage with non-repeating crossbows, +2 Sneak Attack dice and +2 to hit when performing Sneak Attacks.
Action Boost: You drink a potion that you've been saving for a special occasion. Heals you for 10d3+30 (scales with 200% Ranged Power) and adds +10 to Dodge and Maximum Dodge for 10 seconds. For the next 60 seconds, you gain +1d6 to all ability scores, and +2d6 to attack and damage. (Cooldown: 3 minutes) "A little something of your own creation. Potent stuff, drink sparingly."

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sharpshooter I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with all bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. +1 additional damage and one Sneak Attack die with all non-repeating crossbows if you are not dual shooting.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Lacerating Shots
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have upgraded your Great Crossbow to shoot more forcefully than its construction would normally allow. Your Great Crossbow attacks have a [33/66/100]% chance of putting a stack of Bleed on enemies. The bleed effect can stack up to 5 times. Note: Bleed deals 1d6 damage every 2 seconds for 14 seconds. This damage scales with 200% Melee Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Thunderstone
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: Throws an alchemical charge at your enemy. Deals 4d6 +1d[4/6/8] per Sneak Attack Die in sonic damage and dazes in area. Fort DC (Disable Device skill) Negates daze. The damage scales with 200% Ranged Power Cooldown: 12 seconds. Spell Resistance: No

DC.Name: Mechanic: Thunderstone
DC.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: Throws an alchemical charge at your enemy. Deals 4d6 +1d[4/6/8] per Sneak Attack Die in sonic damage and dazes in area. The damage scales with 200% Ranged Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Mechanics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Disable Device, Open Lock, and Repair. +[1/2/3] to Saving Throws you make against traps.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Awareness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Listen, Search, and Spot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sharpshooter II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with all bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. +1 additional damage and one Sneak Attack die with all non-repeating crossbows if you are not dual shooting.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Improved Traps
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Disable Device skill. Elemental Traps that you place now have a DC equal to [65/80/100]% of your Disable Device Skill instead of 50%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/75]% damage and healing of your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells. Adds +[1/3/6] to the save DC's of your offensive wands.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Skill Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +[2/4/6] Action Boost bonus to all skills for 20 seconds. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sharpshooter III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with all bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. +1 additional damage and one Sneak Attack die with all non-repeating crossbows if you are not dual shooting.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Wracking Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Perform melee or ranged attacks that hinder constructs and living constructs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wracking Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals: +10% Damage Ranged Attack: On Damage: Deals [3/6/9]d6 extra damage to constructs and living constructs, and applies Wracked: This construct or living construct's fortification is reduced by -10% and loses its inherent immunity to sneak attack. This effect stacks up to five times.
Damage scales with 200% ranged power. Duration: 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wracking Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals: +10% Damage Melee Attack: On Damage: Deals [3/6/9]d6 extra damage to constructs and living constructs, and applies Wracked: This construct or living construct's fortification is reduced by -10% and loses its inherent immunity to sneak attack. This effect stacks up to five times.
Damage scales with 200% melee power. Duration: 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Ooze Flask
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: You throw a flask at your enemy that contains concentrated gray ooze secretions. Deals 4d6 +1d[6/8/12] per Sneak Attack Die in acid damage and reduces the Armor Class and PRR of your opponent by 2 for 30 seconds. Fort DC equal to Disable Device +1d20 for half damage and to negate sunder effect. Cooldown: 12 seconds. Spell Resistance: No

DC.Name: Mechanic: Ooze Flask
DC.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: You throw a flask at your enemy that contains concentrated gray ooze secretions. Deals 4d6 +1d[6/8/12] per Sneak Attack Die in acid damage and reduces the Armor Class and PRR of your opponent by 2 for 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Use Magical Device
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Use Magic Device

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sharpshooter IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with all bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. +1 additional damage and one Sneak Attack die with all non-repeating crossbows if you are not dual shooting.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Disable Construct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Target construct or living construct is dazed for [10/20/30] seconds. This effect is removed on damage. Using this ability on a target already affected by it will extend the duration. (Cooldown: 25 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Fletching
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are skilled at enhancing, salvaging, and re-purposing your arrows, bolts, and throwing weapons. +[3/6/10] Ranged Power and your ammunition gains a [50/65/80]% chance of returning.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Line up and Sit Down
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Deals: +250% Damage Ranged Attack: On Damage: knocks your enemy down for 2 seconds, no save. Cooldown: 6 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sharpshooter V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3 to-hit and damage with all bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. +3 additional damage and one Sneak Attack die with all non-repeating crossbows if you are not dual shooting.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Rapid Fire
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10]% Doubleshot Doubleshot: Your ranged attacks, including thrown attacks, gain a percent chance to attack with an extra projectile. Repeating Crossbows have a reduced chance to produce extra shots.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Time Bomb
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: Creates an alchemical charge at your feet. Deals [10/25/50] Sonic and [10/25/50] Fire damage per Rogue level to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds, and knocks them to the ground. Scaled with 200% Range Power. Reflex (DC 10 + Disable Device Skill +1d20 for half damage and Negate knockdown. Cooldown: 20 seconds. Spell Resistance: No

DC.Name: Mechanic: Time Bomb
DC.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: Quickly creates an alchemical charge at your feet. Deals [10/25/50] sonic and [10/25/50] fire damage per rogue level to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds, and knocks them to the ground.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Expert Builder
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Multiplier with bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. Great Crossbows instead gain +2 Competence Bonus to Critical Multiplier. Cooldowns of Alchemical Trap attacks are reduced by 20%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Mechanical Reloader
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10 Ranged Power, +10% Ranged Alacrity with repeating crossbows, dual shooters and thrown weapons. +30% to Ranged Alacrity with non-repeating crossbows when not dual shooting.
